682550.name: ワールド・ネバーランド２～プルト共和国物語～EXPERIENCE OF FICTION LIFE
682550.description:
◆What is World Neverland?

``What if you could enter the fantasy world that is the setting for the stories of games and movies and act freely...'' The concept of World Neverland® is to make this a reality.

There is no fixed story in this game.

We have created a ``virtual country inhabited by residents who act according to their own will'' so that players can freely weave their own stories as individual residents.

There is land, nature, buildings, social organizations, and people living there.

There is a day from morning to night, a year of spring, summer, fall, and winter, annual events and seasonal festivals, and residents live from birth, get married, have children, and grow old and die. They live a lifetime, and their work continues for many generations.

Moreover, since it is a simulation, no two countries are exactly the same.

◆How to play Republic of Pluto

Life in this republic is up to the player.

It is up to the player to decide what kind of life they will lead.

◆The basic idea is to “become a resident” and have fun

Every event that the player character experiences in the Republic of Pluto is also experienced by other residents.

Sometimes you are the main character, and sometimes you are a participant.

Players are also free to participate or not.

Taking weddings as an example, you can participate as an attendee not only in your own wedding, but also in your family's weddings and the weddings of your acquaintances.

Such events include personal events such as ``births'', ``weddings'', and ``funerals'', as well as national events such as ``New Year's Festivals'', various Shorg festivals, Shorg leagues, and various martial arts tournaments. there is.

◆Pluto Republic, a maritime city-state rich in nature

The Republic of Pluto is a maritime city-state rich in nature, overlooking the sea to the northwest, and as its name suggests, it is a republic centered on the Saifa Council.

It is a multi-racial country made up of many different races, and its people believe in the polytheistic religion ``Waktism,'' which believes that gods reside in various things in nature.

◆Life in the Republic of Pluto

When children enter school at the age of three, they begin a three-year student period.

During this period, after learning a variety of things, children complete their coming-of-age ceremony at the age of six and graduate from school.

When they reach adulthood, they belong to one of the three martial arts school organizations called Shorg and are considered members of the Republic.

You will also be able to join the professional organization Ulug and work.

The days begin where you train hard every day to raise your rank in the Scholg League, aim to participate in various tournaments, and aim for high income by working hard at Ulug.

Also, love and marriage are allowed, so you can make acquaintances and make friends and lovers.

You can get married, start a family, and have children.
